div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1757 Mesopotamia or Babylonia, 1957 Burial: 310-300 B.C. Contents: 43+ AR Athens: 37 tetradr. Celenderis: 1 st. "Paphus": 1 st. Sidon: 1 1/16 shekel Tyre: 1 shekel Babylon: 1 st. (lion, anchor symbol) Cyrene: 1 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Le Rider (forthcoming)
